text:
(1)
First Avenue, east side, from 58th to 59th Streets, showing the western end of the Queensboro Bridge.
On the site of the excavation at the S.E. corner of 59th Street a sixteen-story apartment building is about to be erected.
October 22, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing a Second Avenue Elevated train on the bridge, bound to or from Corona or Astoria.
October 22, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)

October 22, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

West side of First Avenue across clearing, 59th to 58th Streets.
October 24, 1928.
P.L. Sperr, Photographer.
